data.title: The Heads of Cerberus by Stevens, Francis: Fine Cloth (1952) First Edition.
data.meta_description: First Edition. - Cloth - Polaris, Pennsylvania, USA - 1952 - Condition: Fine - Fine - 53 of 1,500 copies First Edition in Slipcase. Has been in one collection since new and is in exceptionally good condition. Green bds with crisp Silver title with silver motif to front, sl discolouration to cloth and light sunning to slipcase, not bumped, pp 191 Rough cut pages on handmade paper with handset type, interior tight and bright in unread state. Size: 8vo - over 7¾" - 9¾" tall - The Heads of Cerberus

Terms of Sale:

Postage at buyers cost, packaging is no charge.

All books shipped same-day payment is received.

we pack carefully and insure all orders.Payment

by mastercard, visa, or paypal.

Payment must be received in full before goods are

dispatched. If for any reason you are not

satisfied return your book within 30 days and we

will happily refund the book purchase price.

Proprietors

Deborah & Ron Harcus

Ariel Books Ltd

PO Box 8131

Symonds St 1010

Auckland New Zealand

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 1.1 LB, or 500G. If your book order is

heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
